data.description: With this setting you can control the amount of overlap between the skin and walls, which can be set as a true value.
data.img_description: This model has the following skin overlap distance to demonstrate the effect, from left to right; -0,07mm, 0mm and 0,07mm.
data.hints: - A slight overlap between the skin and walls will ensure that all holes on the bottom and the top layers close.
